login.title:
Get the user authentication token.
 
 This is a legacy version of the login request. Using GET is deprecated as your password is likely to appear in logs which record request URLs.
 Use the POST version instead.
login.description:
Get the user authentication token.
 
 This is a legacy version of the login request. Using GET is deprecated as your password is likely to appear in logs which record request URLs.
 Use the POST version instead.

getAllProjects.title: Get the list of projects that the authenticated user is entitled to access.
getAllProjects.description: Get the list of projects that the authenticated user is entitled to access.

getAllRepositories.title: Returns a list of all repositories. This includes plugin provided repositories
getAllRepositories.description: Returns a list of all repositories. This includes plugin provided repositories

browse.title: Lists the contents of the specified directory.
browse.description: Lists the contents of the specified directory.

changes.title: Represents a sorted list of changesets, newest first.
changes.description: Represents a sorted list of changesets, newest first.

getContents.title:
Returns the raw content of the specified file revision as a binary
 stream. No attempt is made to identify the content type and no mime
 type is provided.
getContents.description:
Returns the raw content of the specified file revision as a binary
 stream. No attempt is made to identify the content type and no mime
 type is provided.

history.title: Represents the history of a versioned entity.
history.description: Represents the history of a versioned entity.

getSvnRepositoryDetails.title: For backward compatibility we provide this method, but repositories should be referred to just by their key.
getSvnRepositoryDetails.description: For backward compatibility we provide this method, but repositories should be referred to just by their key.

getAllDetailedReviews.title:
Retrieves all reviews that are in one of the the specified states. For each review all details are included (review items + comments). The
 wiki rendered comments will be available via the <messageAsHtml> element
getAllDetailedReviews.description:
Retrieves all reviews that are in one of the the specified states. For each review all details are included (review items + comments). The
 wiki rendered comments will be available via the <messageAsHtml> element

getCustomFilterReviews.title: To ignore a property, omit it from the query string.
getCustomFilterReviews.description: To ignore a property, omit it from the query string.

postCustomFilterReviews.title:
This method should no longer be used, as it uses a POST for a read-only
 retrieval operation and is provided for backward compatibility only.
postCustomFilterReviews.description:
This method should no longer be used, as it uses a POST for a read-only
 retrieval operation and is provided for backward compatibility only.

getDetailedCustomFilterReviews.title: To ignore a property, omit it from the query string.
getDetailedCustomFilterReviews.description: To ignore a property, omit it from the query string.

postDetailedCustomFilterReviews.title:
This method should no longer be used, as it uses a POST for a read-only
 retrieval operation and is provided for backward compatibility only.
postDetailedCustomFilterReviews.description:
This method should no longer be used, as it uses a POST for a read-only
 retrieval operation and is provided for backward compatibility only.

getFilteredReviewsForUser.title: Get all the reviews which match the given filter, for the current user.
getFilteredReviewsForUser.description: Get all the reviews which match the given filter, for the current user.

getDetailedFilteredReviewsForUser.title: Gets a list of all the reviews that match the specified filter criteria.
getDetailedFilteredReviewsForUser.description: Gets a list of all the reviews that match the specified filter criteria.

getMetrics.title: Get comment metrics metadata for the specified metrics version.
getMetrics.description: Get comment metrics metadata for the specified metrics version.

getReviewsForPath.title: Return a list of Reviews which include a particular file.
getReviewsForPath.description: Return a list of Reviews which include a particular file.

getReviewsDetailsForPath.title: Return a list of Reviews which include a particular file.
getReviewsDetailsForPath.description: Return a list of Reviews which include a particular file.

deleteReview.title:
Permanently deletes the specified review.
 The review must have been abandoned.
deleteReview.description:
Permanently deletes the specified review.
 The review must have been abandoned.

getReview.title:
Get a single review by its permId (e.g. "CR-45").
 If the review does not exist, a 404 is returned.
 
 The moderator element may not exist if the review does not have a Moderator.
getReview.description:
Get a single review by its permId (e.g. "CR-45").
 If the review does not exist, a 404 is returned.
 
 The moderator element may not exist if the review does not have a Moderator.

getAvailableActions.title:
Get a list of the actions which the current user is allowed to perform
 on the review.
getAvailableActions.description:
Get a list of the actions which the current user is allowed to perform
 on the review.

addPatchReview0.title: Old, non-restful name. Kept for backwards compatibility. Exactly the same as POSTing to /{id}/patch
addPatchReview0.description: Old, non-restful name. Kept for backwards compatibility. Exactly the same as POSTing to /{id}/patch

closeReviewWithComment.title: Closes the given review with the summary given.
closeReviewWithComment.description: Closes the given review with the summary given.

getAllComments.title: Return all the comments visible to the requesting user for the review.
getAllComments.description: Return all the comments visible to the requesting user for the review.

addGeneralComment.title: Add a general comment to the review.
addGeneralComment.description: Add a general comment to the review.

markAllCommentsAsRead.title:
For the effective user, mark all comments in a review as read (except
 those marked as leave unread).
markAllCommentsAsRead.description:
For the effective user, mark all comments in a review as read (except
 those marked as leave unread).

updateComment.title: Updates the comment given by the perma id to the new comment posted.
updateComment.description: Updates the comment given by the perma id to the new comment posted.

markCommentAsLeaveUnread.title: Marks the comment as leave unread to the current user - it will not automatically be marked as read by crucible.
markCommentAsLeaveUnread.description: Marks the comment as leave unread to the current user - it will not automatically be marked as read by crucible.

markCommentAsRead.title: Mark the given comment as read for the user used to make this POST.
markCommentAsRead.description: Mark the given comment as read for the user used to make this POST.

getReplies.title: Gets the replies to the given comment.
getReplies.description: Gets the replies to the given comment.

addReply.title:
Adds a reply to the given comment. This call includes the  repsonse header that
 contains the URL of the newly created entity.
addReply.description:
Adds a reply to the given comment. This call includes the  repsonse header that
 contains the URL of the newly created entity.

updateReply.title: Updates a reply with the given newComment.
updateReply.description: Updates a reply with the given newComment.

completeReview.title: Completes the review for the current user
completeReview.description: Completes the review for the current user

getReviewPatches.title: Get a list of patches and their details for the given review
getReviewPatches.description: Get a list of patches and their details for the given review

addPatchToReview.title: Add the revisions in a patch to an existing review.
addPatchToReview.description: Add the revisions in a patch to an existing review.

removePatch.title: Removes the patch with the given id from the review. All of the revisions provided by the patch will be removed as well.
removePatch.description: Removes the patch with the given id from the review. All of the revisions provided by the patch will be removed as well.

publishAllComments.title: Publishes all the draft comments of the current user.
publishAllComments.description: Publishes all the draft comments of the current user.

remindIncompleteReviewers.title: Immediately send a reminder to incomplete reviewers about the given review.
remindIncompleteReviewers.description: Immediately send a reminder to incomplete reviewers about the given review.

getReviewers.title: Get a list of reviewers in the review given by the permaid id.
getReviewers.description: Get a list of reviewers in the review given by the permaid id.

addReviewers.title: Adds the given list of reviewers to the review.
addReviewers.description: Adds the given list of reviewers to the review.

getCompletedReviewers.title: Gets a list of completed reviewers.
getCompletedReviewers.description: Gets a list of completed reviewers.

getUncompletedReviewers.title: Gets a list of reviewers that have not completed the review.
getUncompletedReviewers.description: Gets a list of reviewers that have not completed the review.

removeReviewer.title: Removes the reviewer from the review.
removeReviewer.description: Removes the reviewer from the review.

getReviewItemsForReview.title: Returns a list of all the items in a review.
getReviewItemsForReview.description: Returns a list of all the items in a review.

addFisheyeReviewItem.title: Add the changes between two files in a fisheye repository to the review.
addFisheyeReviewItem.description: Add the changes between two files in a fisheye repository to the review.

addReviewItem.title:
Adds the given review item to the review. This will always create a new review item, even if there is an existing
 one with the same data in the review (in which case the existing item will be replaced).
addReviewItem.description:
Adds the given review item to the review. This will always create a new review item, even if there is an existing
 one with the same data in the review (in which case the existing item will be replaced).

addReviewItems.title: Adds a review item for each of the supplied crucibleRevisionData elements.
addReviewItems.description: Adds a review item for each of the supplied crucibleRevisionData elements.

removeReviewItem.title: Removes an item from a review.
removeReviewItem.description: Removes an item from a review.

getReviewItem.title: Returns detailed information for a specific review item.
getReviewItem.description: Returns detailed information for a specific review item.

addVersionedComment.title: This call includes the  repsonse header that contains the URL of the newly created entity.
addVersionedComment.description: This call includes the  repsonse header that contains the URL of the newly created entity.

setReviewItem.title:
Sets the review item specified by itemId with the given reviewItem. The old review item is discarded. Can only
 perform this operation if the old review item specified by itemId can be deleted. The old review item's permId is
 not changed.
setReviewItem.description:
Sets the review item specified by itemId with the given reviewItem. The old review item is discarded. Can only
 perform this operation if the old review item specified by itemId can be deleted. The old review item's permId is
 not changed.

removeReviewItemRevisions.title:
Removes the revisions given from the review item in the review specified by the id. If the review item has no
 more revisions left, it is automatically deleted.
removeReviewItemRevisions.description:
Removes the revisions given from the review item in the review specified by the id. If the review item has no
 more revisions left, it is automatically deleted.

addReviewItemRevisions.title:
Adds the given list of revisions to the supplied review item, merging if required. For example, if the review
 item for  contains revisions 3 to 6, and if:
addReviewItemRevisions.description:
Adds the given list of revisions to the supplied review item, merging if required. For example, if the review
 item for  contains revisions 3 to 6, and if:

changeState.title: Change the state of a review by performing an action on it.
changeState.description: Change the state of a review by performing an action on it.

getAvailableTransitions.title:
Get a list of the actions which the current user can perform on this
 review, given its current state and the user's permissions.
getAvailableTransitions.description:
Get a list of the actions which the current user can perform on this
 review, given its current state and the user's permissions.

uncompleteReview.title: Uncompletes the review for the current user.
uncompleteReview.description: Uncompletes the review for the current user.

getReviewsForTerm.title: Search for reviews where the name, description, state or permaId contain the specified term.
getReviewsForTerm.description: Search for reviews where the name, description, state or permaId contain the specified term.

getReviewsForIssueKey.title: Get a list of all reviews that have been linked to the specified JIRA issue key.
getReviewsForIssueKey.description: Get a list of all reviews that have been linked to the specified JIRA issue key.

getUsers.title: Get a list of all the users. You can also ask for a set of users.
getUsers.description: Get a list of all the users. You can also ask for a set of users.

getMappedUser.title: Returns the user details of the user mapped to a committer in a repository.
getMappedUser.description: Returns the user details of the user mapped to a committer in a repository.
